entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 01:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
